articles.content: 12.6 Broad to Warner, 2 runs, in the airrrr, put down. That is the perfect outswinger that a right-armer can bowl to a leftie. Full and just outside off stump, lovely away shape, he had Warner pushin… [+291 chars]

articles.description: After 2011, India will again be hosting the ODI World Cup starting on October 5. The Rohit Sharma-led hosts will start their campaign against Australia on October 8 in Chennai and will face Pakistan on October 15
